subject: Re: [junit] displaying multiple errors from the same condition
msgSnippet: ... Collections.EMPTY_LIST was introduced in Java 1.2, along with the rest of the Collections API. Exactly how far back do you need to go? You may be thinking
messageBody:
On 02/12/05, James Abley <james.abley@...> wrote:
> > By the way, the "emptyList" constant already exists:
> > Collections.EMPTY_LIST.
>
>
> Only since Java 5 though; some of us still have to produce code which works
> with earlier versions of Java!

Collections.EMPTY_LIST was introduced in Java 1.2, along with the rest
of the Collections API. Exactly how far back do you need to go?

You may be thinking of the generified version, Collections.emptyList().

--
"Software is too expensive to build cheaply"
Robert Watkins http://twasink.net/ robertdw@...
